10px"},children:[{title:"Role & Responsibilities",content:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{fontSize:14,color:"#232751",lineHeight:"1.55"},children:"In this project, I contributed incrementally through iterative reviews and weekly progress updates. My primary responsibilities focused on defining the project context and conducting requirements analysis. I started by establishing the problem statement, identifying key stakeholders, and evaluating risks and constraints to inform the overall architecture. In later phases, I refined the requirements by detailing functional and non-functional attributes, including scalability, maintainability, and security. I also expanded the data management section by outlining ingestion, storage, and processing mechanisms tailored to real-world scenarios, building upon an initial draft. Additionally, I addressed cloud adoption strategies, security and privacy designs, and considerations for AI/ML and IoT integration, collaborating with team members to develop and finalise these elements. Following peer feedback, I iteratively expanded my contributions to ensure a cohesive and justified architectural design. Finally, I supported the team by editing the final proposal's formatting to maintain professionalism and consistency."})},{title:"Key Results",content:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:"flex",flexDirection:"column",gap:13},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{fontWeight:800,fontSize:30,color:"#2073cd",marginRight:5},children:"40%"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{color:"#232751",fontWeight:500},children:"Reduction in infrastructure costs via serverless adoption"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{fontWeight:800,fontSize:30,color:"#2073cd",marginRight:5},children:"10K"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{color:"#232751",fontWeight:500},children:"Concurrent users supported"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{fontWeight:800,fontSize:30,color:"#2073cd",marginRight:5},children:"99.9%"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{color:"#232751",fontWeight:500},children:"System uptime achieved through HA design"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{fontWeight:800,fontSize:30,color:"#2073cd",marginRight:5},children:"85ms"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{color:"#232751",fontWeight:500},children:"Average API response time at p95"})]})]})},{title:"Reflection",content:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{fontSize:14,color:"#232751",lineHeight:"1.58"},children:["This project reinforced the importance of understanding business constraints and user needs before diving into technical solutions.
